<h2 align=center>
<b>Hi, my name is Victor Sonck</b>
</h2>

<p align=center>
<a href="https://git.io/typing-svg"><img src="https://readme-typing-svg.demolab.com?font=Fira+Code&duration=1000&pause=1000&color=F7F7F7&center=true&width=435&lines=Enthusiastic+ML+Engineer;Avid+Tinkerer;Linux+Aficionado;Open+Source+Contributor;Public+Speaker;Freelancer" alt="Typing SVG" /></a>
</p>

<p align=center>
I'm a Developer Advocate at <a href="https://clear.ml">ClearML</a> where I'm the designated jack of all trades. Creating machine learning projects to show off the MLOps toolstack, editing tutorial videos on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@ClearML">Youtube</a> and contributing to the ClearML codebase as well as several other open source projects.
</p>

<p align=center>
My freelancer business is called <a href="https://projectwhy.be">Project Why</a>.
</p>
